body:
Successfully builds on macOS 10.15.7 with Python 3.8.8 and Apple Clang 12.0.0.

For some reason, when I try to use this package, I see:
```python
>>> import cv2
>>> cv2.imread()
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
AttributeError: module 'cv2' has no attribute 'imread'
```
I have no idea why this is the case or how to fix it. I'm installing `opencv+python+contrib`.

@bvanessen
title: OpenCV: add new version, simplify package
